title: Guatemala follows U.S to open Jerusalem embassy
text:
Guatemala follows U.S to open Jerusalem embassy 1:05pm EDT - 01:06
A second country has moved its embassy to Jerusalem - Guatemala - despite the international backlash against the United States when it made the same move. The Palestinians want East Jerusalem for a future capital, and they're mostly backed by the international community.
